akas: Aventuras con los Kratt Uruguay (dubbed version)
akas from release info: Aventuras con los Kratt Uruguay (dubbed version)

1.title: Mystery of the North Pole Penguin
1.plot: Wild Kratts learn about the secret creature powers of Penguins in Antarctica, as well as why most penguins only live there. They however get word from Wild Kratt Kid Nua that there are penguins in the Arctic.

2.title: Temple of Tigers
2.plot: Worried that they have lost there "creature senses", Chris and Martin head to India to find the master of stealth, the Tiger. But little do they know they are being followed by Donita.

3.title: The Dhole Duplicator
3.plot: Believing their is a dog called a Dhole that is tough enough to stand up to a Tiger, Martin and Chris search for this elusive creature. Meanwhile Aviva finishes her latest invention.

4.title: The Cobra King
4.plot: The Wild Kratts search for Martin's Creature Pod only to discover that a Spectacled Cobra is sitting on it.

5.title: Fire Salamander
5.plot: Martin and Chris are in Germany's Black Forest when they find a Salamander crawling out of there campfire. They try to figure out how these Fire Salamanders are able to do this. Donita Donata, however, over hears this and decides to make a fire proof body suit out of the Salamanders skins.

6.title: Cheeks the Hamster
6.plot: Aviva loses her Micro XT Power chips in the forest of Germany. Knowing they are a important peace of technology the Wild Kratts turn to the help of the Creature Powers of the Hamster.

7.title: Wild Ponies
7.plot: After a storm, the Wild Kratts must return a lost horse foal to its mother.

8.title: Elephant Brains
8.plot: The Wild Kratts go to India to find the difference between African and Asian Elephants. But find out how complex these creatures really are. Meanwhile Paisley Paver plans on using the elephants as beasts of burden.

9.title: Sloth Bear Suction
9.plot: The Wild Kratts recieve a call from Wild Kratts kid Mala about an endangered creature called a Sloth Bear. They do more research on the animal while also trying to save it from Donita's fashion line.

10.title: City Hoppers!
10.plot: While Aviva and Koki help Wild Kratts kids Nolan and Sani build a Catapult, Martin and Chris try to explore the creature powers of the Grasshopper. Meanwhile, Donita Donata and Paisley Paver meet at Zach Varmitech's headquarters.

13.title: Blue Heron
13.plot: While traveling on a dirt road, the Wild Kratts discover a Blue Heron and take the time to observe its physical features and hunting strategies. Zach Varmitech takes this opportunity to make an attack on the Tortuga.

14.title: Choose Your Swordfish
14.plot: Aviva challenges the Kratt Brothers to a fencing competition. But they will only accept the challenge if she makes a creature power suit for one of the three kinds of billfish- Swordfish, Marlin, and Sailfish. Meanwhile, Zach starts collecting fish from the ocean.

15.title: Komodo Dragon
15.plot: While doing her usual 'villain checkup', Koki notices Chef Gourmand traveling to the island of Komodo. Believing she has heard the name before she asks the Kratt brother about the island. Martin and Chris then realize that there's only one animal on that island that would satisfy Gourmands taste, the Komodo Dragon.

18.title: The Fourth Bald Eagle
18.plot: While adventuring in Alaska, the Kratt Brothers decide to live in a nest of Bald Eagles as Eaglets. But little do they know that Chef Gaston Gourmands next meal involves Bald Eagle eggs.

19.title: The Erminator
19.plot: While on a mission to explore the creature powers of the chickadee - and to discover why such a little bird can make it through the toughest winters - Martin and Chris get separated. While Chris makes it back to the Tortuga with his chickadee findings, Martin encounters an ermine. With the help of this little weasel, Martin also learns what it takes to survive in this harsh environment.

20.title: Hercules-The Giant Beetle
20.plot: While exploring beetle exoskeletons in South America, a Hercules Beetle gets enlarged by the Miniaturizer.

1.title: Mom of a Croc
1.plot: Chris and Martin are determined to prove to Aviva that there's more to crocodiles than their reputation as scary brutes.

2.title: Whale of a Squid
2.plot: Chris and Martin are taking Aviva's sub prototype out for a test drive when it gets sucked into a battle between a sperm whale and giant squid, spiraling down into the depths.

3.title: Aardvark Town
3.plot: When a young aardvark accidentally becomes a stowaway in Chris's backpack, the Wild Kratts team sets off on a "door to door" search to return him to his home burrow.

4.title: Flight of the Draco
4.plot: While on a mission to discover the secret of the Draco lizard's gliding abilities, Martin and Chris uncover an evil plot by fashion designer, Donita Donata.

5.title: Mystery of the Squirmy Wormy
5.plot: Martin Kratt and Chris Kratt go on another creature adventure. In this one, they shrink down to the size of worms to discover why worms go to the surface when it rains.

6.title: Platypus Cafe
6.plot: While kayaking in Australia, Martin and Chris encounter one of the world's most unusual creatures, a platypus mother with her eggs.

7.title: Polar Bears Don't Dance
7.plot: While in the Arctic, Martin and Chris are on a mission to discover how animals move around in different environments. Their new knowledge comes in handy when they discover that Zach Varmitech has kidnapped a Walrus calf and a Polar bear cub. The Wild Kratts team must do what it takes to return the baby animals to their mothers.

8.title: Build It Beaver
8.plot: The Wild Kratts team must lend a hand to help a beaver rebuild its damaged lodge and restore the ecosystem for all the creatures who live there.

9.title: Voyage of the Butterflier
9.plot: Using Aviva's newly invented Butterflier XT, the miniaturized Kratt Brothers embark on the most incredible insect voyage in the world - the Monarch butterfly's 2,000 mile migration.

10.title: Honey Seekers
10.plot: While on an adventure to discover the toughest animal in Africa, Martin and Chris uncover the amazing relationship between the Honey guide bird and Honey badger.

11.title: Bass Class
11.plot: Martin and Chris are in the middle of a friendly competition to find Small-mouth and Large-mouth Bass when they meet Wild Kratts Kid, Gavin, who is fishing.

12.title: Fireflies
12.plot: It's time for the annual Wild Kratt Firefly picnic.

13.title: Mystery of the Weird Looking Walrus
13.plot: Chris and Martin are on a mission to discover why walrus look so weird, but discover that Zach Varmitech has kidnapped a herd to mine precious pearls for Donita Donata's fashion line.

14.title: Tazzy Chris
14.plot: When Martin and Chris assist the Tasmanian Wildlife Service in tagging endangered Tasmanian Devils, they discover that Zach Varmitech has been kidnapping them to create a ferocious new Zachbot.

15.title: Octopus Wildkratticus
15.plot: When Martin accidentally knocks Aviva's creature power suits into a deep Arctic trench, the Martin and Chris dive down in search of them in Aviva's newly invented Octopod submarine.

16.title: Walk on the Wetside
16.plot: When Martin and Chris search for and find an amazing water-walking Basilisk lizard in Costa Rica, they try to replicate its actions in order to learn how this rare lizard is able to walk on water.

17.title: Elephant in the Room
17.plot: When Martin and Chris find a lone baby elephant, they bring him back to the Tortuga HQ for safety until they find his Mom.

18.title: Let the Rhinos Roll!
18.plot: The Wild Kratt team is on a mission to discover why Rhinos are mysteriously disappearing from the African Savannah.

19.title: Kickin' It with the Roos
19.plot: When Martin and Chris meet up with a mob of Red Kangaroos, they get their car keys stolen by a little joey and have to figure out how to get them back from one very smart joey.

20.title: The Blue and the Gray
20.plot: When a Creature Power Suit malfunction turns Martin into an Oak tree, the Wild Kratts team has to use their knowledge of Gray squirrels and Blue jays to save the day.

21.title: Falcon City
21.plot: The Kratt brothers are itching to fly with the world's fastest animal, the Peregrine falcon, which can hit top speeds of 240 mph.

22.title: Koala Balloon
22.plot: Martin and Chris must protect a koala bear stranded in the Australian Outback, and help him get back to his Eucalyptus forest habitat.

23.title: Cheetah Racer
23.plot: Chris and Martin announce that no creature or vehicle can travel as fast over the rough and tumble African savannah as the cheetah. Aviva takes the challenge and declares she will build a ground racer that can race faster than a cheetah.

24.title: Mimic
24.plot: While exploring why some animals mimic the looks of others, Martin and Chris come across a cheetah cub and its mom. But before they know it, evil fashion designer, Donita Donata, 'catnips' the mom right in front of their eyes. The Wild Kratts team go into action to rescue the cheetah before Donita adds her to her new Fall line-up.

25.title: Ker-Honk
25.plot: When Chris and Martin's Creature Power suits get jammed in Proboscis monkey mode, they find themselves joining the troop to help them stay out of reach of the top predators of the Indonesian rainforest.

26.title: Caracal-Minton
26.plot: Chris and Martin must recover Aviva's precious family heirloom - a badminton birdie - from the elusive, leaping Caracal cat.

27.title: Zig-Zagged
27.plot: Martin and Chris find themselves in a Zebra stampede, and when the dust clears, a lone baby Zebra is left behind. They must now return him to his Mom, with predators abounding along the way.

28.title: A Huge Orange Problem
28.plot: While Chris and Martin are off searching for the endangered orangutan in the deep forests of Borneo, back at the Tortuga HQ, Aviva, Koki, and Jimmy come down with an itchy rash. The only problem is they don't have a first aid kit, but the Kratts learn that by using orangutan ingenuity, they can quickly cure the team's itch.

29.title: Seasquatch
29.plot: While exploring the strange landscape of the ocean depths, the Kratt Brothers' sub loses power and they are trapped on the ocean floor. Aviva has to figure out how to harness the energy from the deep sea's hydrothermal vents in order to save the brothers and return them to the surface.

30.title: The Food Chain Game
30.plot: Aviva wants to build a food web for the African savannah, so she devises a game and Chris and Martin take the challenge! They will each start as a blade of grass and climb to the top of the food chain in a game of "Creature Power Suit Creature Tag".

31.title: Masked Bandits
31.plot: The Wild Kratts team starts to notice strange things happening in the Tortuga HQ. Jimmy is sure there is a ghost living with them, but they soon discover it's a raccoon family causing all the trouble.

32.title: Flight of the Pollinators
32.plot: When a miniaturized Chris gets covered with pollen and ends up sticking to a bee, he gets carried off into the world of the pollinators. Martin, Aviva, and the team must find Chris in an adventure that uncovers the amazing delivery system of plants and their animal partners.

33.title: The Gecko Effect
33.plot: There's a mystery to be solved by the Wild Kratts team, as they try to uncover how a Gecko lizard climbs up smooth surfaces so easily. They use the solution to help them escape from a glass terrarium where they have been imprisoned by Zach Varmitech, so he can steal their miniaturizer.

34.title: Little Howler
34.plot: Chris and Martin are unpacking their bags from an adventure and are surprised to pull out a Wolf pup. They have no idea where it came from and must retrace their steps in order to return him to his pack.

35.title: Quillber's Birthday Present
35.plot: It's Aviva's birthday, and Chris and Martin set out to collect porcupine quills for a beautiful necklace with surprising results.

36.title: A Bat in the Brownies
36.plot: When a bat gets trapped in the Tortuga HQ, the Wild Kratts team has to overcome its various negative feelings about the winged mammals in order to help him back out into the wild.

37.title: Stuck on Sharks
37.plot: Martin and Chris are on a mission to see something that no one has ever seen before - the birth of a baby great white shark. They use a Remora Rocketsub to "stick with" a female shark and learn the secrets of shark life and birth.

38.title: Birds of a Feather
38.plot: Martin, Chris and crew are in New Guinea to discover why male Birds of Paradise have the best dance moves in the forest.

39.title: Googly-Eye the Night Guru
39.plot: When Martin and Chris glimpse a mysterious nocturnal creature living in the Indonesian forest, they secretly "borrow" Aviva's half finished night vision goggles to go in search of it.

40.title: Raptor Roundup
40.plot: Martin and Chris are on a mission to check out hawks, eagles, owls, falcons and vultures. But evil chef Gourmand has his own plan for the raptors and has been capturing them in his quest to find the tastiest raptor wing. The Wild Kratts team must rescue the raptors before they become Gourmand's next gourmet delicacy.

1.title: Bad Hair Day
1.plot: From PBS KIDS: Chris and Martin try to help a lion named "He who breathes fire" get past obstacles and back to his pride, who are under siege from two intruder lions.

2.title: Race for the Hippo Disc
2.plot: From PBS KIDS: When Chris and Martin accidentally lose a Power Disc on the African savannah, the Wild Kratts goes into crisis mode to find the disc before it gets into the hands of Zach Varmitech.

3.title: Creature Power Challenge
3.plot: From PBS KIDS: After getting caught in the middle of a tussle between a grumpy rhino and an outraged elephant, Martin and Chris decide to have a contest to decide what's stronger - elephant or rhino powers.

4.title: Termites vs. Tongues
4.plot: From PBS KIDS: When Aviva and Koki accidentally miniaturize themselves and get carried away by termites, Martin and Chris must split up to search for them.

5.title: Happy Turkey Day
5.plot: From PBS KIDS: The Wild Kratts are on a mission to defend the honor of the wild turkey and to stop Gourmand, who is hunting for the largest, fattest turkey in the forest.

6.title: Neck and Neck
6.plot: From PBS KIDS: As Chris and Martin search for the answer to why giraffes have long necks, a mischievous giraffe begins secretly taking Creature Power Suit parts and supplies from the Tortuga.

7.title: Bugs or Monkeys?
7.plot: From PBS KIDS: A miniaturized Martin wants to check out insects in the rainforest, but Chris wants to investigate the world of the Spider monkey. Chris wins when he puts "mini" Martin in his backpack and heads off through the treetops.

8.title: Secrets of the Spider's Web
8.plot: From PBS KIDS: When the creature adventuring Kratt Brothers take a nasty tumble, the Wild Kratts sets off on a mission to find and recreate one of the greatest of all biotech engineering secrets. Spider silk.

9.title: Shadow: The Black Jaguar
9.plot: From PBS KIDS: Martin and Chris are trying to decide on their next wild cat adventure when they learn that Zach Varmitech has decided to "catnap" a Black Jaguar to use as a symbol for his new spybots.

10.title: To Touch a Hummingbird
10.plot: From PBS KIDS: Martin and Chris realize that the Hummingbird might be the ultimate flier in the Creature world and ask Aviva to create a new power disc with its powers. The only problem - it's not easy to touch a Hummingbird!

11.title: Rainforest Stew
11.plot: From PBS KIDS: When Chris and Martin go in search of an obscure rainforest creature to add to their Life Lists, the Wild Kratts becomes embroiled in the complex relationships of a tropical rainforest.

12.title: Seahorse Rodeo
12.plot: From PBS KIDS: While exploring the world of the seahorse, Martin and Chris uncover a plot by Donita Donata to capture these amazing creatures and turn them into living jewelry.

13.title: Speaking Dolphinese
13.plot: From PBS KIDS: The Wild Kratts are on a mission to decode the secret language of one of the smartest creatures on Earth - Dolphins!

14.title: Aquafrog
14.plot: From PBS KIDS: While the Wild Kratts explore the life cycle of the Bull Frog, they uncover a plot by Zach Varmitech to destroy the frogs' habitat. With the help of some Wild Kratts kids, the team moves quickly to stop Zach.

15.title: Tortuga Tune Up
15.plot: From PBS KIDS: Aviva loves the Tortuga design, but feels there's something missing. Martin and Chris realize it can't really swim, so they decide to get some bio inspiration for this feature by exploring the world of the sea turtles.

16.title: Blowfish Blowout
16.plot: From PBS KIDS: When the miniaturized Kratt Brothers get swept up and lost in a current of plankton, they become part of a crowd of fish larva all headed to the most populated and diverse habitat on Earth - the coral reef.

17.title: Roadrunner
17.plot: From PBS KIDS: Koki wants to leave the Sonoran Desert to resupply the Tortuga, but Chris and Martin don't want to go until they track down a mysterious lizard. But they'll need the help - and powers - of their friend the Road Runner.

18.title: Rocket Jaw: Rescuer of the Reef
18.plot: From PBS KIDS: While checking out how coral reefs are formed, the Wild Kratts discover that Zach and Donita have sent robotic Parrotfish to collect coral to make jewelry. Martin and Chris must use the power of the greatest hunters of the reef to stop this evil plot.

19.title: Snow Runners
19.plot: From PBS KIDS: On their way to return some Hispid hares to Asia, the Wild Kratts accidentally lose them in a wintery North American forest. Martin and Chris must use the amazing winter adaptations and strategies of the Snowshoe hare and lynx to locate the hares before it's too late.

20.title: Attack of the Tree Eating Aliens
20.plot: From PBS KIDS: The Wild Kratts get an urgent call from a group of North American Wild Kratts kids telling them almost all of the trees in the forest are dying. It's a race against time to solve the mystery and help the forest and the creatures who live there.

21.title: Rattlesnake Crystal
21.plot: From PBS KIDS: After the Tortuga crash lands in the Sonoran Desert, Koki discovers that the Tellurium crystals have run out of power and they need a new supply. Martin and Chris volunteer to go out in the desert to find this important source of energy and discover more than they were expecting!

22.title: Skunked
22.plot: From PBS KIDS: When a group of skunks take over the Tortuga and decide to make it their home, the Wild Kratts must find a way to try and reclaim their headquarters.

23.title: Gila Monster Under My House
23.plot: From PBS KIDS: The Wild Kratts receive a call from Xavier, a Wild Kratt kid who lives in the Sororan Desert. A Gila monster has crawled under his house and he's scared! Martin and Chris go to check it out and Xavier soon learns about the amazing life of this creature.

24.title: Desert Elves
24.plot: From PBS KIDS: When Koki and Jimmy get stranded in the desert, Aviva and the Kratt Brothers must rely on the eyes and ears of the Elf owl to help find their friends in the harsh habitat.

25.title: Ground Hog Wake Up Call
25.plot: From PBS KIDS: Aviva discovers a cute Ground Hog in a meadow and decides to create - and test on herself - a Creature Power Suit. Aviva discovers one of their powers is hibernation and goes into a deep winter sleep. It's up to Martin and Chris to discover what causes ground hogs to wake up, so they can rescue Aviva.

26.title: Journey to the Subnivean Zone
26.plot: From PBS KIDS: When a mission to discover the birth of a snowflake goes wrong, the Kratt Brothers discover a strange and unlikely colony of snow creatures living in the mysterious Subnivean Zone.

1.title: Hermit Crab Shell Exchange
1.plot: Martin and Chris discover a hermit crab on the beach and soon the Wild Kratts team is exploring the amazing world of this shell changing creature.

2.title: When Fish Fly
2.plot: Martin and Chris challenge Koki and Aviva to a contest about who has the most challenging job. In their quest to win this challenge, the gang uncovers an unlikely animal partner that could ultimately lead either team to victory...or defeat.

3.title: Slider, the Otter
3.plot: The Wild Kratts discover a lost otter cub. Assuming he is lost, the bros attempt to find his family, while introducing him to life in the Cypress Swamp of Florida.

4.title: Mosquito Dragon
4.plot: When Koki and Jimmy get walloped by mosquitoes in the Cypress Swamp, Aviva, Martin, and Chris go on a fact-finding adventure to find out exactly why mosquitoes try to steal our blood in the first place!

5.title: Under Frozen Pond
5.plot: The Wild Kratts head to a frozen pond to see what the water animals do during winter. However Zach, Donita and Gourmand want to have a secret meeting in that area, resulting in a hockey game between them to see who stays and who goes.

6.title: Search for the Florida Panther
6.plot: When the Wild Kratts team gets an alert from a Wild Kratts kid that an injured endangered Florida Panther was just spotted off the Alligator Alley highway, the team springs into rescue mode.

7.title: Osprey
7.plot: Jimmy accidentally drops the keys to the Tortuga into the ocean. Chris, Martin and Aviva are on a race to develop osprey creature powers to find the keys before they disappear forever.

8.title: Opossum in My Pocket
8.plot: While on a mission to find Chris' night vision goggles lost in the Cypress swamp, the brothers discover a marsupial opossum with a similar problem.

9.title: Bandito: The Black Footed Ferret
9.plot: When an impatient Martin takes rides Aviva's new digging machine, the Stone Digger, without asking, he crashes into an unknown part of the Prarie and discovers a new colony of Black Footed Ferrets.

10.title: Where the Bison Roam
10.plot: When the Wild Kratts Team decides to explore the spot where early explorers Lewis and Clark first laid eyes on the American prairie, they discover that prairies and the amazing bison herds of yore are much harder to find these days.

11.title: Crocogator Contest
11.plot: Chris surprises the crew by asking what the differences are between a crocodile and an alligator, so the Wild Kratts decide to do an investigation in the form of a contest to find out.

12.title: The Amazing Creature Race
12.plot: The Wild Kratts hold a tag-team race to determine who the fastest animals are, but little do they know that Zach is waiting to capture the winning animal to use as a "runner-bot".

13.title: Prairie Who?
13.plot: A twister surprises the Tortuga in flight - and all the gang abandons ship and gets separated out in the prairie. While searching for each other, the Wild Kratts Team discovers the amazing species that inhabit the Prairie.

15.title: Chameleon on Target
15.plot: Aviva is working on a special ring chip that will super power her "inventuring", but it's stolen by a mysterious lemur. Martin and Chris are off to the rescue and along the way, they learn about the amazing world of chameleons.

16.title: Fossa Palooza
16.plot: Chris, bummed that the gang must leave Madagascar without ever having seen amazing fossa, accidentally falls out the hatch of the Tortuga in mid-flight and lands deep in an island forest - amongst a group of the very creatures he longed to find!

17.title: Mini Madagascar
17.plot: With no big land predators, Chris realizes that Madagascar is one of the safest places in the world for adventuring. It's the perfect place to miniaturize and explore. But the 'mini' Kratts soon discover, they made a big mistake!

18.title: Aye Aye
18.plot: When the Wild Kratts team embarks on a pirate adventure in the Indian Ocean, they discover a very strange, other-worldly castaway.

19.title: Lemur Legs
19.plot: The Wild Kratts arrive in Madagascar for the first time - touching down in the southern region known as the spiny desert - where they discover a group of sifaka lemurs. Soon, they are learning about these lemurs amazing vertical clinging and leaping abilities.

20.title: Lemur Stink Fight
20.plot: While in Madagascar, the Wild Kratts hear signs of a dispute between two troops of Ring-tailed lemurs. So they set out to figure out just what these two lemur groups are arguing about.

21.title: Golden Bamboo Lemur
21.plot: While in Madagascar, the Wild Kratts learn from Wild Kratts Kid, Patricia Ranomafana, that a Golden Bamboo lemur baby has been born. The Team decides to stay a bit longer to learn about this rare lemur.

22.title: Tenrec Treasure Hunt
22.plot: When Chris sets up an elaborate treasure hunt centering on a cool and rare group of insectivores - the Tenrec - from Madagascar, the rest of the crew sets off to complete the hunt.

23.title: Praying Mantis
23.plot: Two Wild Kratts kids wake up to find the praying mantis cocoons they've been keeping in their room have hatched - they now have 200 babies! Sending out a Wild Kratts Alarm, the Tortuga rushes to help them, and return the baby mantises safely to the wild.

24.title: Capture the Fishmobile
24.plot: When Aviva unveils her new Fishmobile invention, designed to keep up with the rapid, precise movements of schooling fish, Chris and Martin challenge the gang to a brand new creature game.

25.title: Back in Creature Time: Day of the Dodo
25.plot: Chris, Martin and Koki go back in time to the 1600's using Aviva's new time trampoline to save the dodo bird from extinction.

26.title: Back in Creature Time: Tasmanian Tiger
26.plot: Chris, Martin and Aviva time travel to 1880's Tasmania in an attempt to save the Tasmanian tiger from extinction.

1.title: Liturgusa Krattorum
1.plot: The Wild Kratts are thrilled when they learn that a recently discovered species of praying mantis is named in honor of the Kratt brothers. They then head out to learn more about this mantis, but when Zach Varmitech, Donita Donata, and Gourmand also learn of this creature, they work together to capture them and use them for their own schemes.

2.title: Panda Power Up!
2.plot: While the Wild Kratts conduct a population survey of giant pandas, Zach Varmitech schemes to capture the pandas and make them into robotic stuffed toys.

3.title: Snowy Owl Invasion
3.plot: The Wild Kratts hear about snowy owls being sighted in areas far south of their usual Arctic habitat. The team decides to investigate, but trouble starts when Donita Donata decides to make hats out of the snowy owls.

4.title: Pangolin Rescue
4.plot: After discovering a pangolin and its amazingly unique keratin scales, the Wild Kratts receive an alert from two Wild Kratt kids in China. The pangolins in their forest are in trouble! The gang responds, uncovering Chef Gourmand Gaston's latest plan to make Smoothies using pangolin scales. The Wild Kratts must tap into the real power of the pangolin's scales - as an incredible defense - to rescue this little-known creature.

7.title: Puffin Rescue
7.plot: A rouge wave crashes into the Tortuga, separating the crew. Each crew member is on there own, except for Martin. On his island, he discovers a creature who might be able to help. A Puffin.

8.title: Stars of the Tides
8.plot: When Martin and Chris argue about who gets to keep a prized creature souvenir, Aviva unveils a new Creature Power Challenge that should settle things. This time, Martin and Chris must make it through the day in one of the harshest habitats on Earth, the rocky intertidal. The Kratt Bros. must use the creature powers of the intertidal to outlast each other and win the prize.

9.title: The Last Largest Lobster
9.plot: The Wild Kratts are having a picnic when a seagull steals one of their creature power discs and drops it into the ocean. The Kratt Bros dive in to retrieve the disc and encounter an enormous lobster. Martin and Chris begin to follow him to investigate the life of a lobster. But there's someone else on the lobster's trail. It's Chef Gourmand Gaston, who plans to catch him and "cook him up".

10.title: Golden Snub Nosed Monkey Man
10.plot: The Wild Kratts go on an expedition into the Chinese mountains to find the amazing Snub nosed monkeys, a species of cold-adapted monkeys living in the snowy highlands. But when Martin becomes separated in an avalanche and his power suit malfunctions, it's a race against time for the Wild Kratts to find Martin, the Giant Snub-nosed Monkey Man!

11.title: The Other Martins
11.plot: It's a relaxing day at Tortuga HQ when Chris comes in complaining about Martin. Confused, the gang soon discovers that Chris means a bird called the Purple martin and not his brother! Chris is not happy about something else named Martin and when a second creature called Martin comes along, but soon, comes to understand what awesome creatures these "Other Martins" really are.

12.title: Eel-lectric!
12.plot: When the Tortuga crashes in the Amazon rainforest, the ship's electrical systems get damaged. However, Chris and Martin soon find a creature that may be able to solve the Tortuga's electricity problem: the electric eel.

13.title: Mystery of the Two Tusked Narwhal
13.plot: While the Kratt Brothers are observing the differences between horns and antlers, Wild Kratts Kid Ronan tells them they should do an adventure with Narwhals. And soon the Wild Kratts enter the world of Tusks.

14.title: Sea Otter Swim
14.plot: Jimmy finally admits to the crew that he's not a strong swimmer. Determined to help him, Martin and Chris take Jimmy to get swimming lessons from a Sea Otter named Couch.

15.title: Red Panda Rescue
15.plot: Chris finds a lost Red Panda in the Bamboo forests of China. He decides to show the crew his new little friend. But little do they know is that Zach Varmitech is after the little panda, and plans on making it Donita's birthday present.

16.title: Spirit Bear
16.plot: Martin and Chris take Aviva to Bear Island to search for black bears and learn more about their creature powers. But they find more than what they expect and they meet their newest villain, Paisley Paver.

17.title: The Colors of China
17.plot: While hanging out with Golden pheasants in China, Martin and Chris wonder how important color is for creatures. But when Donita Donata begins to steal animals and remove their color, they soon discover just how critical it is for survival. It's a race to stop Donita and get color back into the creature world!

18.title: Box Turtled In!
18.plot: When the Wild Kratts Tortuga is accidentally miniaturized and carried off by a coyote, the mothership's shell defense is finally put to the test. The gang embarks on a box turtle-style mission to get back to the Miniaturizer and restore the Tortuga back to normal size.

19.title: Animals Who Live to Be 100 Years Old
19.plot: The Wild Kratts travel around the world to find and protect the oldest living animals in the world from Zach Varmitech who wants to use their secrets of long life to live forever.

20.title: Archerfish School
20.plot: Chris has decided to practice something he always wanted to do, Archery. Only he's not very good at it. So he decides to take lessons from one of the greatest archers in nature, the Archerfish. But can he learn this skill in time to stop Donita Donata's newest fashion line.

21.title: This Orca Likes Sharks
21.plot: The Kratt brothers find a map showing the travels of a legendary orca that supposedly specializes in eating large sharks, causing them to search for it.

22.title: Baby Tooth and Kid Musky
22.plot: The Kratt Brothers are in the Arctic checking out two different animals, the MuskOx and the Arctic Wolf. Martin wants Aviva to make MuskOx powers and Chris wants her to make Arctic Wolf powers. But they soon realize that the relationship between these two creatures is not a friendly competition.

23.title: Cheetah Adopted
23.plot: The Kratt Brothers are in the African Savanna exploring, while waiting for the rest of the crew to get back from there supply run. While exploring, Martin and Chris see there Cheetah cub friend Spot Swat. But he has been adopted, by a Warthog.

24.title: Musk Ox Mania
24.plot: Chris forgets his valuable souvenir collection in the Arctic tundra, so the Wild Kratts travel there to search for the collection using the Creature Powers of the musk ox before Zach Varmitech gets his hands on it.

25.title: Creatures of the Deep Sea: Part 1
25.plot: With Aviva's new submarine the Wild Kratts head down deeper than they have ever been before into the sea to discover bizarre creatures and maybe even a new species. But Chef Gourmand is also looking for rare sea creatures down there.

26.title: Creatures of the Deep Sea: Part 2
26.plot: The Wild Kratts attempt to stop Gourmand from cooking deep sea creatures and learn more about the deep sea in the process.

imdb.plot outline: Chris and Martin Kratt are brothers who explore the wild throughout the world to learn more about animals and share conservation information. They have three friends who travel in the Tortuga HQ with them named Aviva, Koki and Jimmy Z. The brothers have creature power suits that allow them to experience what it's like to be the animals they find. The team helps them by creating power suit creature disks for each animal they study. They also bring them supplies and help them out of tricky situations when their adventures get dicey. The group has to overcome villains as well, like a chef who wants to serve endangered species on his menu, or a clothing designer who wants to trap and use live animals to make her clothing line, or a tech villain who wants to turn animals into robots to do his bidding. All of the villains have no regard for nature or conservation. Wild Kratts is a great cartoon adventure show for kids where they can learn about new animals and why conservation is so important!
imdb.title: Wild Kratts

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

synopsis: Chris and Martin are split up and are with different friends looking for the same type of creature. It is a creature that is very endangered but it is something that if everyone can help protect it it will survive. The north atlantic and northern pacific right whales in north america are endangered but also the right whale in africa is endangered.people have been hunting them and so i am going to add a new villian and all the others will still be there but when the new villian comes whoever it might be they will be taking creatures and putting packages of whatever they have around on the creatures backs and dealing it out.
